Description: Cozy studio apartment in Allston. Very close to Boston University and the Green Line for easy access to Boston. Available for move in on 9/1/2023. Hardwood flooring through out the apartment. Big windows for plenty of natural lighting. Heat and hot water included. Laundry in the building. Only 1/2 months broker fee. Call now!
